Directions: In a shallow bowl, combine the first five ingredients.  Place milk in another shallow bowl.  Dip chicken in milk, then roll in pecan mixture.  Place in a single layer in an ungreased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.  Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until juices run clear.
Ingredients: 3/4 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch strips
